LanguageData.RimMetrics.UI.TopStatsWaiting: Top stats will calculate at the start of the next day.
LanguageData.RimMetrics.UI.GroupedStatsWaiting: Stats will calculate at the start of the next day.
LanguageData.RimMetrics.UI.SelectColonistToView: Select a colonist to view stats.
LanguageData.RimMetrics.UI.TopStatsTooltip: Top stats are calculated once each in-game day.\n\nSix top stats are selected randomly to be displayed here. A colonist is considered top in their stat if they're first, second, or third, as denoted by the star color.
LanguageData.RimMetrics.UI.StatsListSearchTooltip: Stats are calculated once each in-game day.\n\nUse the search bar to filter stats by label.
